messages.message:
Hey team, in this PR -> https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/73337
We have removed the deployment-config folders, and build changes to remove deployment-config for the env-vars, meaning missing variables are coming as false, hence, breaking things on crafting
For unblocking, we can add the variables to env-local, but there are lot of them required
Sample use case, is running flows and apps
cc @mfichman
I tested on crafting without issue. What env var is problematic?

Hey, so, it's for variables not present in `env-local*.json's` and `config.py` (eg. `ENABLE_READER_PAGE`), or whose default is incorrect or missing secret (eg. `AZURE_FORM_RECOGNIZER_API_KEY`)
We can try to fix them one by one as we see
These were earlier working, since, they were getting created from the `deployment-config` correctly
Please update your sandbox! I took care of those already.
